basic_movement.name: Basic Movement (4 cardinal directions)
basic_movement.description: Move north, south, east, west on flat terrain
basic_movement.notes: Foundation for all movement. Uses WASD keys.

diagonal_movement.name: Diagonal Movement
diagonal_movement.description: Move in 8 directions (NE, NW, SE, SW)
diagonal_movement.notes: Combines cardinal movements. W+D = northeast, etc.

climb_up_one.name: Climb Up 1 Block
climb_up_one.description: Manually climb up exactly 1 voxel height
climb_up_one.notes: Uses Space key. Player must be standing next to elevated block.

descend_one.name: Descend 1 Block
descend_one.notes: Fixed: removed check for empty space at target. Uses Shift key. testMultipleDescents tests sequential descents.

auto_descent.name: Auto-Descent (Walk Down)
auto_descent.description: Automatically descend when walking onto lower terrain
auto_descent.notes: Different from manual descent (Shift key). This happens automatically when walking forward onto lower ground. testDiagonalAutoDescent tests diagonal + descent.

auto_climb.name: Auto-Climb 1 Block
auto_climb.description: Automatically climb when walking into 1-block obstacle
auto_climb.notes: Quality of life feature. Happens automatically when walking (WASD) into 1-block step. testDiagonalAutoClimb tests diagonal + climb, testComplexTerrain tests multiple elevation changes.

gravity.name: Gravity/Falling
gravity.description: Fall to ground level when no voxel below
gravity.notes: Applies constant downward force. testGravityFall tests spawning in mid-air, testWalkOffLedge tests falling after walking off edge.

jump.name: Jump (Horizontal + Vertical)
jump.description: Jump across gaps and up simultaneously

flight_basic.name: Basic Flight
flight_basic.description: Free 3D movement in all directions, ignore terrain

flight_nosedive.name: Flight Nosedive
flight_nosedive.description: Initiate flight from elevated position by descending
flight_nosedive.notes: Advanced flier technique - requires descent to activate

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hook (ODM-style)
grappling_hook.description: Target and swing to distant elevated points

climb_wall.name: Wall Climbing (Multi-block)
climb_wall.description: Climb vertical surfaces multiple blocks high

stand_on_dynamic.name: Stand on Dynamic Objects
stand_on_dynamic.description: Stand on moving objects (tornado debris, platforms)

criticalPath.description: Mechanics that block the most other features
